ygData.subject: Diamond dust
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not a tinker, I ll say that from the start... but my girlfriend plays a gnome, so I joined this list about.. oh, 143 messages ago in hope of getting
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not a tinker, I'll say that from the start... but my girlfriend plays a
gnome, so I joined this list about.. oh, 143 messages ago in hope of getting
information to help her tinker.

I have spoken to the little gnome in Rathe Mountains, and from the dialog,
it would seem that he is willing to work on the more exquisite gems, and
asks what I have... at this point, I ran out of time and had to go, but I
think that exploring the possible dialogs with him is the answer.

I suggest everyone go talk to him, as he did offer to work on gems, we just
have to find out the hidden key words.

Good luck with your tinkering everyone, if anyone on Bertoxxulous ever gets
to the re-breather stage, I would love to buy or trade for one.

Neren Silverwolf
Wood Elf, 35 Druid, Bertoxxulous
